trans-unit.source:
It seems that AutoFill did not close correctly the last time.
This can happen with large databases or memory-demanding database settings (Argon2).
Please contact us if you need help with this.
trans-unit.target:
Het lijkt erop dat AutoFill de laatste keer niet juist is afgesloten.
Dit kan gebeuren bij grote databases of geheugenslurpende databaseinstellingen (Argon2).
Neem contact met ons op als je hulp nodig hebt.

trans-unit.source: KeePassium will remember which entry you select for each website and then suggest it automatically.
trans-unit.target: KeePassium onthoudt welk item je selecteert voor elke website en stelt het dan automatisch voor.
trans-unit.note: Description of the 'Remember Selected Entries` feature
Title for referring to the app or webpage that launched AutoFill. For example: `Context: google.com`
Must match Apple's translation, as found in iOS 18 Settings → General → AutoFill & Passwords. If unsure, leave untranslated.
Call to action: deselect the `Keychain` option. Keychain is a glossary term.

trans-unit.source: To make KeePassium your default password manager, uncheck "%@".
trans-unit.target: Om KeePassium je standaard wachtwoordbeheerder te maken, haalt u het vinkje weg "%@".
trans-unit.note: Instruction to deselect another app in the settings [appName: String]
Must match Apple's translation, as found in iOS 17 Settings → Passwords → Password Options. If unsure, leave untranslated.

trans-unit.source:
The AutoFill cannot automatically access the files you already have in the main KeePassium app.
Why? Behind the scenes, the system treats AutoFill as a separate app, independent from the main KeePassium process. For security reasons, an app cannot simply access any external files – unless you explicitly link these files to that app. Thus the system guarantees that the app can only access the few files you allowed it to.
As a result, both AutoFill and the main KeePassium app need to be given their own permissions for each external file. Luckily, this is a one-time procedure.
trans-unit.target:
AutoFill kan niet automatisch toegang krijgen tot de bestanden die je al hebt in de KeePassium-app.
Waarom? Achter de schermen behandelt het systeem AutoFill als een aparte app, onafhankelijk van het KeePassium-proces. Om veiligheidsredenen kan een app niet eenvoudig externe bestanden openen, tenzij je deze bestanden expliciet koppelt aan de app. Het systeem garandeert zo dat de app alleen toegang heeft tot de weinige bestanden die je hebt aangegeven.
Als gevolg hiervan moeten zowel AutoFill als de KeePassium-app hun eigen machtigingen krijgen voor elk extern bestand. Gelukkig is dit een eenmalige procedure.
trans-unit.note: No comment provided by engineer.

trans-unit.source: KeePassium needs access to NFC to communicate with your YubiKey.

trans-unit.note: Privacy - NFC Scan Usage Description

trans-unit.source: KeePassium needs the camera to scan QR codes.
trans-unit.target: KeePassium heeft de camera nodig om QR-codes te scannen.
trans-unit.note: Privacy - Camera Usage Description

trans-unit.target: Gebruik FaceID om KeePassium te ontgrendelen
trans-unit.note: Privacy - Face ID Usage Description

trans-unit.source: KeePassium needs permission to export files to your Photo Library.
trans-unit.target: KeePassium heeft toestemming nodig om bestanden te exporteren naar je galerij.
trans-unit.note: Privacy - Photo Library Additions Usage Description

trans-unit.source: KeePassium needs access to select images for custom icons and to scan QR codes for OTP setup.
trans-unit.target: KeePassium heeft toegang nodig tot geselecteerde afbeeldingen voor aangepaste pictogrammen en om QR-codes te scannen voor het instellen van OTP's.
trans-unit.note: Privacy - Photo Library Usage Description

trans-unit.target: Je organisatie vereist een complexer databasewachtwoord.

trans-unit.source: This password is easy to guess. Try entering a stronger one.
trans-unit.target: Dit wachtwoord is makkelijk te raden. Probeer een sterker wachtwoord in te voeren.
trans-unit.note: Notification when user sets up too weak a database password.

trans-unit.id: [Database/Create] Please enter a password or choose a key file.
trans-unit.source: Please enter a password or choose a key file.
trans-unit.target: Voer een wachtwoord in of kies een sleutelbestand.
trans-unit.note: Hint shown when both password and key file are empty.

trans-unit.source: KeePassium will contact websites associated with each entry.
trans-unit.target: KeePassium maakt contact met websites die gekoppeld zijn aan elk item.
trans-unit.note: Description of favicon downloader feature.

trans-unit.source: Doing this on a public or monitored network can expose the list of websites where you have an account.
trans-unit.target: Door dit op een openbaar of gecontroleerd netwerk te doen, kan de lijst van websites waar u een account hebt worden onthuld.
trans-unit.note: Description of favicon downloader feature. 'Doing this' refers to downloading favicons.
Placeholder text in an empty group

trans-unit.target: %1$@ wordt als zwak beschouwd. Gebruik %2$@ in plaats daarvan.
trans-unit.note: Warning that one key derivation function (KDF) should be preferred to another. Example: 'AES-KDF is considered weak. Use Argon2id instead.'

trans-unit.source: These settings may be too slow for some devices.
trans-unit.target: Deze instellingen zijn mogelijk te traag voor sommige apparaten.

trans-unit.source: Increase the settings for optimal data protection.
trans-unit.target: Verhoog de instellingen voor optimale gegevensbescherming.
trans-unit.note: Call to action when encryption settings are too weak.

Action/button to set up the App Protection feature. Not a call to action.

trans-unit.source: KeePassium is your vault. App protection ensures that only you can open it.
trans-unit.target: KeePassium is je kluis. Appbescherming zorgt ervoor dat alleen jij hem kunt openen.
trans-unit.note: Text in the App Protection onboarding screen.
Title of the App Protection onboarding screen
Action/button to set up the Password AutoFill feature. Not a call to action.

trans-unit.source: With AutoFill you can breeze through sign-in pages with a single button press.
trans-unit.target: Met Vul automatisch in kun je snel door aanmeldpagina's gaan met een druk op een knop.
trans-unit.note: Text in the Password AutoFill onboarding screen.

trans-unit.source: To start, activate Password AutoFill in system settings.
trans-unit.target: Activeer Wachtwoord automatisch invullen in de systeeminstellingen om te beginnen.
trans-unit.note: Text in the Password AutoFill onboarding screen.
Title of the Password AutoFill onboarding screen
Action/button

trans-unit.source: Your safe box is an encrypted database.
trans-unit.target: Je kluisdoos is een versleutelde database.
trans-unit.note: Text in the Data Encryption intro screen

trans-unit.source: You can keep databases in your favorite cloud or locally on device.
trans-unit.target: Je kunt databases in je favoriete cloud of lokaal op je apparaat houden.
trans-unit.note: Text in the Data Encryption intro screen
Title of the Data Encryption intro screen

trans-unit.source: KeePassium keeps your passwords and other sensitive info securely encrypted.
trans-unit.target: KeePassium houdt je wachtwoorden en andere gevoelige gegevens veilig versleuteld.
trans-unit.note: Text in the introductory onboarding screen.

trans-unit.source: There are no ads and no tracking.
trans-unit.target: Er zijn geen advertenties en geen tracking.
trans-unit.note: Text in the introductory onboarding screen.

trans-unit.source: We don't know anything about you.
trans-unit.note: Text in the introductory onboarding screen.
Text in the introductory onboarding screen.
Title of the introductory onboarding screen.

trans-unit.source: Your info is encrypted in a safe box (database). Safe boxes are stored in a vault (KeePassium).
trans-unit.target: Je gegevens zijn versleuteld in een kluisdoos (database). Kluisdozen worden opgeslagen in een kluis (KeePassium).
trans-unit.note: Text in the Security intro screen

trans-unit.source: The vault and safe boxes have different keys and only you will know them.
trans-unit.target: De kluis en kluisdozen hebben verschillende sleutels en alleen jij weet die.
trans-unit.note: Text in the Security intro screen
Title of the Security intro screen
Action to skip selected item/items in future password audits.
Status message: password audit in progress

trans-unit.source: An error occured while communicating with the HIBP service. %@
trans-unit.target: Er is een fout opgetreden tijdens de communicatie met de HIBP-service. %@
trans-unit.note: Error message after a failed password audit request [message: String].

trans-unit.source: The number shows how many times the password has been found in known data leaks.
trans-unit.target: Het getal laat zien hoe vaak het wachtwoord is gevonden bij bekende datalekken.
trans-unit.note: Description of the password audit results, where a number appears next to each password.

trans-unit.source:
Password audit checks your passwords against an online database of leaked passwords in a secure and private way.
KeePassium will send information calculated from your passwords — a kind of a partial checksum — to the [Have I Been Pwned](https://haveibeenpwned.com) service. The service will return detailed information about compromised passwords with similar checksums. The app will then compare the detailed checksums locally on the device and detect which of your passwords are at risk.
Your actual passwords are never shared with the online service. [Learn more…](%@)
trans-unit.target:
Wachtwoordaudit controleert uw wachtwoorden op een veilige en privé manier aan de hand van een online database met gelekte wachtwoorden.
KeePassium stuurt informatie die is berekend op basis van uw wachtwoorden (een soort gedeeltelijke controlesom) naar de service [Have I Been Pwned] (https://haveibeenpwned.com). De service retourneert gedetailleerde informatie over gecompromitteerde wachtwoorden met vergelijkbare controlesommen. De app vergelijkt vervolgens de gedetailleerde controlesommen lokaal op het apparaat en detecteert welke van uw wachtwoorden gevaar lopen.
Uw daadwerkelijke wachtwoorden worden nooit gedeeld met de online service. [Kom meer te weten…](%@)
trans-unit.note: Description of the Password Audit function.

trans-unit.source: Good news! None of your passwords have appeared in known data leaks.
trans-unit.target: Goed nieuws! Geen van uw wachtwoorden is verschenen in bekende datalekken.
trans-unit.note: Result of a password audit.
Title of a list with passwords that are known to have been exposed in online breaches.
Action/button: intiate password audit
Title of a screen to check which passwords are known to be compromised.
Menu action to add a user-provided word list file to the app.
Password quality description. Note the tilda that refers to an estimated/approximate value. For example: `Very good (~123 bits of entropy)`. [level: String, formattedBitCount: String]
Password quality description. For example: `Very good (234 bits of entropy)`. [level: String, formattedBitCount: String]
Good password quality
Very good password quality
Very weak password quality
Weak password quality
Password quality description. For example: `Password quality: Weak`. [level: String]
Status: special premium for beta-testing environment is active
Status: validity period of once-and-forever premium
Status: current version of the app. For example: `Current version: 1.23`. Should be similar to the `Licensed version` string. [version: String]
Status: premium subscription has expired. For example: `Expired 1 day ago`. [timeFormatted: String, includes the time unit (day, hour, minute)]
Status: licensed premium version of the app. For example: `Licensed version: 1.23`. [version: String]
Status: scheduled renewal date of a premium subscription. For example: `Next renewal on 1 Jan 2050`. [expiryDateString: String]
Status when the user has a premium version

trans-unit.id: [Premium/usage] App being useful: %@/month, that is around %@/year.
trans-unit.source: App being useful: %1$@/month, that is around %2$@/year.
trans-unit.target: App is nuttig: %1$@/maand - dat is ongeveer %2$@/jaar.
trans-unit.note: Status: how long the app has been used during some time period. For example: `App being useful: 1hr/month, about 12hr/year`. [monthlyUsage: String, annualUsage: String — already include the time unit (hours, minutes)]
Action/button to make password visible as plain-text

trans-unit.source: KeePassium needs camera access to scan QR codes.
trans-unit.target: KeePassium heeft toegang tot de camera nodig om QR-codes te scannen.
trans-unit.note: Explanation why the app needs camera access permission.
Error message when the app cannot use the camera.
Error message

trans-unit.source: Internal error in QR code reader. Check diagnostic log for details.
trans-unit.target: Interne fout in QR-codelezer. Controleer de diagnostische log voor meer informatie.
trans-unit.note: Error message with a suggested action.

trans-unit.source: Looks like there’s no QR code in that image.
trans-unit.target: Het lijkt erop dat die afbeelding geen QR-code bevat.
trans-unit.note: Notification message
Error message when camera/gallery/etc is either missing or forbidden.

trans-unit.source: Point the camera at a QR code.
trans-unit.target: Richt de camera op een QR-code.
trans-unit.note: Call to action/instruction for QR code scanner.

trans-unit.source: Quick AutoFill shows relevant entries right next to the password field, without opening KeePassium.
trans-unit.target: Deze functie toont relevante items naast het wachtwoordveld zonder KeePassium te openen.
trans-unit.note: Description of the Quick AutoFill feature.
Placeholder text for empty search results
Title of the confirmation dialog for `Delete` action for several items
Title of the confirmation dialog for `Exclude from audit` action for several items
Title of a section in settings: parameters that protect access to data
Call to action (protect the app from unauthorized access)
Description of `Activate app protection` call to action.

trans-unit.source: Allows biometric authentication as a quick (but less secure) alternative to passcode.
trans-unit.target: Hiermee kan biometrische verificatie als een snel (maar minder veilig) alternatief voor AppLock-toegangscode worden gebruikt.
trans-unit.note: Description of biometric unlock settings
Settings switch: whether App Protection is allowed to use Touch ID/Face ID. Example: 'Use Touch ID'. [biometryTypeName: String]

trans-unit.source: Ensures KeePassium is locked after you force-close the app or restart the device.
trans-unit.target: Zorgt ervoor dat KeePassium is vergrendeld nadat u de app gedwongen hebt afgesloten of het apparaat opnieuw opstart.
trans-unit.note: Explanation for the `Lock on App Launch` setting

trans-unit.target: Vergrendelen bij het starten van de app
trans-unit.note: Setting switch: whether to lock the app after it was terminated and relaunched.

trans-unit.source: Ensures KeePassium is locked when you lock your Mac.
trans-unit.target: Zorgt dat KeePassium vergrendeld is wanneer je je Mac vergrendelt.
trans-unit.note: Explanation for the `Lock on macOS Screen Lock` setting
Title of a yes/no setting: whether to lock app when computer screen is locked (see https://support.apple.com/en-gb/guide/mac-help/mchl8e8b6a34/mac)

trans-unit.source: If you enter a wrong app protection passcode, KeePassium will close all databases and clear all master keys from the keychain.
trans-unit.target: Als u een verkeerde AppLock-toegangscode invoert, dan sluit KeePassium alle databases en wist alle hoofdsleutels uit de sleutelhanger.
trans-unit.note: Description of the `Lock on Wrong Passcode` setting
Title in the settings: whether to lock databases when user enters a wrong app protection passcode.
An option in Settings. Will be shown as 'Passcode Attempts Until App Reset: Do not reset'

trans-unit.source: App reset will delete all the stored keys, settings, database backups, imported files, and links to external files. However, if app reset is triggered from AutoFill, imported files may remain due to technical limitations.
trans-unit.target: Een appreset verwijdert alle opgeslagen sleutels, instellingen, databaseback-ups, geïmporteerde bestanden en links naar externe bestanden. Als de appreset echter wordt geactiveerd vanuit Automatisch invullen, kunnen geïmporteerde bestanden achterblijven vanwege technische beperkingen.
trans-unit.note: Description of the `Passcode Attempts Until App Reset` setting
Title in the settings: number of failed passcode attempts that will reset the app into 'just installed' state.

trans-unit.source: The app will automatically lock up after this time.
trans-unit.target: De app vergrendelt automatisch na deze periode.
trans-unit.note: Description of the App Lock Timeout setting
Title for App Lock Timeout setting
Settings section: what happens if user enters incorrect App Protection passcode.
Settings: subtitle of the `App Protection` section. biometryTypeName will be either 'Touch ID' or 'Face ID'. [biometryTypeName: String]
Settings: subtitle of the `App Protection` section when biometric auth is not available.
Settings section: protection of the app from unauthorized access

trans-unit.target: Na het verlaten van de app
trans-unit.note: Description of those 'App Protection Timeout' options that trigger when the app is minimized. For example: 'Timeout: 3 seconds (After leaving the app)
An option in Settings. Will be shown as 'App Lock: Timeout: Immediately'
An option in Settings. Will be shown as 'App Lock: Timeout: Never'
Description of those 'App Protection Timeout' options that trigger when the user has been idle for a while. For example: 'Timeout: 3 seconds (After last interaction)
Action that opens system settings or instructions

trans-unit.source: Before first use, you need to activate AutoFill in system settings.
trans-unit.target: Voordat je automatisch invullen kunt gebruiken, moet je deze functie in Instellingen activeren.
trans-unit.note: Description for the AutoFill setup instructions

trans-unit.source: When AutoFill inserts the username and password, it can also copy the one-time password (OTP) for you.
trans-unit.target: Als AutoFill de gebruikersnaam en het wachtwoord invoert, dan kan het ook het eenmalige wachtwoord (OTP) voor je kopiëren.
trans-unit.note: Description of the 'Copy OTP to Clipboard' setting
Title of a yes/no setting: copy one-time password to clipboard when using AutoFill

trans-unit.source: KeePassium will remember which entry you select for each website and then suggest it automatically.
trans-unit.target: KeePassium onthoudt welk item je selecteert voor elke website en stelt het dan automatisch voor.
trans-unit.note: Description of the 'Remember Selected Entries' setting.
Title of a yes/no setting: remember which entry was used for AutoFill on which website.
Title of a help article on how to activate AutoFill.

trans-unit.source: AutoFill is not available in KeePassium for Intune.
trans-unit.target: AutoFill is niet beschikbaar in KeePassium voor Intune.
trans-unit.note: No comment provided by engineer.

trans-unit.source: When AutoFill finds only one, perfectly matching, entry – this entry will be pasted automatically.
trans-unit.target: Als AutoFill slechts één perfecte overeenkomst vindt, dan wordt deze automatisch ingevuld.
trans-unit.note: Description of the 'Fill-In Perfect Result Automatically' setting

trans-unit.target: Vul het meest overeenkomende resultaat automatisch in
trans-unit.note: Title of a yes/no setting: automatically use the single best match found by AutoFill search
Option in settings: whether to open the last used database automatically on start.
Title of a section in settings
Title of the success message for `Clear Key File Associations` button
Action to clear/erase info about which database uses which key file
Title of the success message for `Clear Master Keys` button
Title of a setting: time after which clipboard will be cleared
Section title in Settings
An option in Settings. Will be shown as 'Clipboard Timeout: Never'

trans-unit.source: When you copy anything, KeePassium will automatically clear your clipboard after some time.
trans-unit.target: Als je iets kopieert, dan wist KeePassium na enige tijd automatisch je klembord.
trans-unit.note: Description of the 'Clipboard Timeout' setting.
Section title: advanced/expert settings

trans-unit.target: Vergrendelen bij opnieuw starten van apparaat
trans-unit.note: Setting switch: whether to lock databases after device reboot.
Title of a yes/no setting: whether to lock databases when computer screen is locked (see https://support.apple.com/en-gb/guide/mac-help/mchl8e8b6a34/mac)
Subtitle for `Data Protection` section in settings

trans-unit.source: Before saving a database, KeePassium will automatically make a copy, just in case.
trans-unit.target: Voordat je een database opslaat, maakt KeePassium automatisch een kopie, gewoon voor het geval dat.
trans-unit.note: Description of the 'Make Backup Copies' setting
Title of a yes/no setting: whether to back up databases before saving them
Confirmation dialog message to delete all backup files
Action to delete all backup files from the app. `ALL` is in capitals as a highlight. [backupFileCount: Int]

trans-unit.source: Defines whether backup databases created by KeePassium should be excluded from iCloud/iTunes backup. Applies to all the existing and future backup files.
trans-unit.target: Definieert of back-updatabases gemaakt door KeePassium al dan niet moeten worden opgenomen in de back-up van iCloud/iTunes. Geldt voor alle bestaande en toekomstige back-upbestanden.
trans-unit.note: Description of the 'Exclude Backup Files from System Backup' setting

trans-unit.source: Exclude Backup Files from System Backup
trans-unit.target: Back-up bestanden niet opnemen in systeemback-up
trans-unit.note: Title of a yes/no setting: whether app's internal backup copies should be excluded from global system backup
Setting title: how long to keep backup copies. Example: 'Keep Backup Files: Forever'
Setting title: how long to keep backup copies. For example: `Keep Backup Files: 3 days`
Status message: there are no backup files to delete

trans-unit.source: KeePassium can automatically delete old backup files to free up some storage space.
trans-unit.target: KeePassium kan oude back-upbestanden automatisch wissen om ruimte vrij te maken.
trans-unit.note: Description of the `Periodic Cleanup` settings
Settings section: automatic deletion of old backup files

trans-unit.source: Backup copies will appear along with the original files.
trans-unit.target: Back-ups worden bewaard naast de oorspronkelijke bestanden.
trans-unit.note: Description of the 'Show Backup Files' setting
Section header, refers to Apple's backup services (https://support.apple.com/HT203977)
Title of a settings section: backup of databases

trans-unit.source: If you are not interacting with the app for some time, the database will be closed for your safety. To open it, you will need to enter its master password again.
trans-unit.target: Als je al even niks hebt gedaan in de app, dan wordt de database omwille van de veiligheid gesloten. Voer je hoofdwachtwoord opnieuw in om de app weer te openen.
trans-unit.note: Description of the `Database Timeout` setting
Title of a setting: the time after which databases will be locked.

trans-unit.target: Bij het verlaten van de app
trans-unit.note: A description/subtitle for the 'Database Timeout: Immediately'.
An option in Settings. Will be shown as 'Database Timeout: Immediately'
An option in Settings. Will be shown as 'Database Timeout: Never'

trans-unit.source: Hide passwords and other protected fields behind asterisks (recommended).
trans-unit.target: Maskeer wachtwoorden en andere beveiligde velden met jokertekens (aanbevolen).
trans-unit.note: Description of the 'Hide Passwords' setting.
Title of a yes/no setting

trans-unit.source: Remember and automatically select the last used key file for each database. Clearing the associations does not affect the files.
trans-unit.target: Onthoud en selecteer automatisch het laatst gebruikte sleutelbestand van elke database. Het wissen van de associaties heeft geen invloed op de bestanden.
trans-unit.note: Description of the 'Remember Key Files' setting
Title of a section in Settings

trans-unit.source: Cached keys allow KeePassium to skip key derivation and YubiKey scans whenever possible.
trans-unit.target: Sleutels in cache laten KeePassium waar mogelijk sleutelafleiding en YubiKey-scans overslaan.
trans-unit.note: Description of the 'Cache Derived Encryption Keys' setting
Action: clear/erase/delete stored master keys
Title of a yes/no setting.

trans-unit.source: Once you unlock a database, its master key can be stored in device's secure keychain. The next time, KeePassium will use that key so you won't have to type your full master password again.
trans-unit.target: Zodra je een database ontgrendelt, kan de hoofdsleutel worden opgeslagen in de beveiligde sleutelhanger van het systeem. De eerstvolgende keer gebruikt KeePassium deze sleutel zodat je je volledige hoofdwachtwoord niet opnieuw hoeft te typen.
trans-unit.note: Description of the 'Remember Master Keys' setting.
Title of a section in settings
Title of a section in settings
Title of a section in Settings
Title of a section in settings
Title of a setting: whether search looks in field names
Title of a setting: whether search looks in passwords
Title of a setting: whether search looks in values of protected fields
Title of a setting: which fields to consider in search

trans-unit.source: After opening a database, automatically show the search field.
trans-unit.target: Toon automatisch het zoekveld na het openen van een database.
trans-unit.note: Description of the 'Start with Search' setting.
Title of a setting: whether to open search field immediately after opening a database
Section title in settings

trans-unit.source: If the app is locked, it acts without confirmation.
trans-unit.target: Als de app vergrendeld is, werkt het zonder bevestiging.
trans-unit.note: Description of the 'Ask for Confirmation' setting.
Title for a setting: whether the app should show an 'Are you sure?' before continuing
Title for a setting: what the app should do when the user shakes the device
Title of a section in settings: parameters that control what happens when the app is started.
Title of a section in settings: technical support and diagnostics

trans-unit.source: Use Universal Clipboard to copy and paste between your Apple devices. On external devices, this clipboard is cleared after two minutes.
trans-unit.target: Gebruik het universele klembord om te kopiëren en plakken tussen je Apple-apparaten. Op externe apparaten wordt dit klembord na twee minuten gewist.
trans-unit.note: Description of the 'Universal Clipboard' setting.
Apple's term: https://support.apple.com/102430

trans-unit.source: Protect your cloud data using app-folder-only permissions.

trans-unit.source: Quickly sign in to any app or web browser using key-press emulation.

trans-unit.source: Drag and drop, select multiple items, and browse alphabetically.
